name: No King No Kingdom
description: Ride on Dragons! command peasants, build towns, raise an army, take your sword and fight side by side with your troops against giant epic bosses. All of that and much more from the first person view.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer. (32x or 64x) Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.3 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Work in progress: new features may raise the bar, optimizations may lower the bar
